TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_tanaya’, title = tanaya’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/tanaya’} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:長) tanaya' ku labi nu kasienawan. 冬天的夜晚很長. tadatanaya' (kamu nu hulam:太長) tadatanaya' kuna satelec. 這皮帶特別長. tanaya'ay (kamu nu hulam:長的) tanaya'ay a culay malatawataw. 長的竹竿成為曬衣竿. manamuh kaku tu tanaya'ay ku sapelek a tatayna. 我喜歡睫毛長的女生.

(kamo no holam:長) tanaya' ko labi no kasienawan. 冬天的夜晚很長. tadatanaya' (kamo no holam:太長) tadatanaya' kona satelec. 這皮帶特別長. tanaya'ay (kamo no holam:長的) tanaya'ay a colay malatawataw. 長的竹竿成為曬衣竿. manamoh kako to tanaya'ay ko sapelek a tatayna. 我喜歡睫毛長的女生.
